Reviews.Title: I hope i can rate them -5
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: The other items are after market. The lens is not new. Now the foucos of the camera doesn't work anymore, i have to fix it by my own. And actullay i use the cemra only few times since i bought it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Nicole Moore
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The picture quality is great. The only negative is it did not come with a manual but, I have found answers online for the questions I have had.  Shipper shipped my order quicker than expected.

Reviews.Title: NIKON D 7100 BUNDLE
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Everything came as described, I did have a little bump, not the fault of Sunset Electronics, called Sunset, and they stepped up and took care of the problem.  They were more than helpful and made it right, and I will always use Sunset for my camera needs.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with product
Reviews.Author: Guru R.
Reviews.Content: every thing came as expected.. in fact i received bonus i.e. a insurance which cover 3 years of worth $1000!!!!

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING!!!!
Reviews.Author: donald payne
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected and more... shopped this locally and this was by far the better deal. " I AM LOVING IT"

Reviews.Title: Great cam!
Reviews.Author: Ker Lee
Reviews.Content: So many functions you'll need to take a class to operate it correctly. Don't forget the speed lights and multi lens, some of which cost more than the cam itself.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon 24MP D7100 Bundle - Includes Nikon AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR - Nikkor 55-200mm f/4-5.6G IF-ED
16GB SDHC Memory Card - USB Card Reader - Spare Battery
3 Piece Lens Filter Kit - Digital Flash
Full Size Tripod - Lens Cleaning Kit
Deluxe Carrying Case
